data.title: Great customer service and food!
data.text: The menu is simple and delicious. We had chili dogs and chili burgers with homemade fries, which were a hit with the whole family. The food was preparred exceptionally fast which is great for workers or people looking for a quick stop when traveling through. It is a family run business and we enjoyed visiting with them. The restrooms and facilities were spotless! I would highly recommend! #dinelocal

data.title: BEST BURGERS!!
data.text: If you're downtown, find this place.  Her burgers are great! Very large portions.  Homemade, all the flavor!! Odd hours, so call and make sure they're open.

data.title: good food
data.text: this is a small restaurant serving mainly at lunch time to court house crowd. great tasting hamburgers.

data.title: Delicious burgers and hot dogs
data.text:
This little gem is almost hidden from view, even though it is on a corner.  Located just across the street from the Taylor County Courthouse, this "hole-in-the-wall" burger joint is really quite busy during the week with white collar and blue collar patrons.  

Their menu is simple, mostly burgers and combos.  The burgers come on a grilled bun and taste homemade and all the fixings.  A good portion of fries or tots can be had with any combo.  You order at the counter and get your drink, then they will bring the food out to you.  The staff is always walking around visiting with patrons and collecting meal baskets and trash.  The place is kept very clean.  Don't expect the ambiance to be A+, but you don't really need it to be to have a good meal.

There hot dogs also come in a grilled but, which is almost unheard of in Texas.  It is more New England style.  They are delicious also.  My kids love them.  

If you want a delicious burger or a hot dog on a toasted bun, check Gloria's out.

data.title: Best burger
data.text: We came here because of the good reviews and it didn't disappoint! The burgers are delicious and the onion rings are some of the best ever! The staff is friendly and the owner Gloria is friendly and visits with you to make sure everything is ok. We will defenitely eat here again!

data.title: good eats
data.text: love to eat here the food is great and the staff is friendly there is no one judging you, unlike the civic plaza hotel where the owners always act like they are better than you

data.title: the very best hamburger
data.text: extremely friendly people and the best hamburgers in the whole state....also the onion rings are incredible!!

data.title: First Time and Will Go Back!
data.text: A friend took me to Gloria's and it was awesome! The fries were good, but the burger and service were outstanding! The hours are mainly lunch, but this little dive is worth the trip at lunch!

data.title: Hole in the wall
data.text: Small little dive but they make a really good patty melt. Not very expensive and not long of a wait but good lunch.  If you find yourself around the courthouse in Abilene and get hungry.... why not you can do worse, but keep it a secret! Dont need this place filling up

data.title: Quaint little cafe
data.text: I ate here when performing jury duty and had the chicken salad. It tasted good but the only option for dressing was ranch or salsa. Fortunately I do like salsa on my salad so it worked out. I loved the atmosphere and down home feel of this place and recommend anyone looking for a quick inexpensive lunch while supporting a local small business to give it a try.

data.title: This burger will make you want to slap yo Mama!
data.text: This is by far one of the best burgers you will ever eat!  If you are expecting an expensive fancy gourmet burger, this is not the place for you.   This is a small Mom & Pop type restaurant with a hand-written menu board, but the burgers aren't small on taste!  Your burger will be made to your specifications and served up hot!  The veggies are fresh, crisp, and very tasty!  By the way, the fries they serve up are the good ones!  The staff at this restaurant are very friendly and eager to please.

data.title: best burger in West Texas
data.text: By far the best burger in west Texas,  Plan to do lunch, cause they are not open for dinner.  Made from fresh ground beef and brought to your table so hot you've got to give it a moment to cool off.  when ever I'm downtown at lunch you'll see me there
